findings.title: ruri home route points outside output directory
findings.suggested_next_step: Adjust route paths or publish legacy pages inside the build output so switcher targets are in the same root.

findings.title: ruri content route points outside output directory
findings.suggested_next_step: Keep switcher targets under the published root or host legacy files alongside the generated output.

findings.title: blog home route points outside output directory
findings.suggested_next_step: Adjust route paths or publish legacy pages inside the build output so switcher targets are in the same root.

findings.title: Content items are not distributed across experiences
findings.suggested_next_step: Confirm intended experience assignment per content item; add items for missing experiences or adjust routing.

findings.title: immersive home missing experience branding
findings.suggested_next_step: Inject the experience-specific name/description into page titles and hero metadata for each template.
